footer.copyright: © 2026 Geek Out With Me. Passion Breaks Language Barrier.
home.hero.subtitle: Whether you're into anime, cooking, tech, or music — find your level, discover the perfect resources, and connect with fellow geeks learning Japanese and English.
home.features.title: How It Works
home.features.levelCheck.title: Level Check
home.features.levelCheck.desc: Take our text and voice assessment to discover your reading, writing, and speaking levels in Japanese or English.
home.features.resources.title: Personalized Resources
home.features.resources.desc: Tell us your interests — we'll recommend free resources matched to your level and passions.
home.features.workbook.title: 30-Day Workbook
home.features.workbook.desc: AI creates a personalized 30-day English workbook tailored to your interests. Level up with daily quizzes and conversation practice.
home.features.community.title: Community
home.features.community.desc: Join our weekly language exchange and voice lounges to practice with fellow learners and native speakers.
home.cta.title: Ready to Geek Out?
home.cta.subtitle: Start with a free level check — no sign-up required.
levelCheck.title: Level Check
levelCheck.subtitle: Find out your reading/writing and speaking levels
levelCheck.selectLang.title: Which language are you learning?
levelCheck.selectMode.title: What would you like to assess?
levelCheck.selectMode.subtitle: You can do both for a complete picture
levelCheck.question: Question
levelCheck.transition.title: Reading Assessment Complete!
listening.listenFirst: Listen to the audio first, then answer the question
voice.notSupported.title: Voice Assessment Not Supported
voice.notSupported.desc: Your browser doesn't support voice recognition. Please try Chrome, Edge, or Safari.
voice.tooShort: Your response is too short. Please record a longer answer.
results.title: Assessment Complete!
results.subtitle: Here's what we found
results.skillGap: Your reading/writing and speaking levels are different — this is totally normal! Many learners have stronger skills in one area.
results.fallbackNotice: Note: The speaking assessment used simplified analysis because the AI service was unavailable. Results may be less precise than usual.
results.personalizeBtn: Get personalized recommendations based on your interests
results.comingSoonSub: Join our community to get notified.
results.levels.english.starter.desc: You're just getting started! Focus on basic vocabulary and simple phrases.
results.levels.english.starter.goal: Learn greetings, numbers, and basic sentence patterns (A1)
results.levels.english.A1.desc: Beginner — You can understand and use familiar everyday expressions and very basic phrases.
results.levels.english.A1.goal: Build vocabulary for daily routines and simple conversations (A2)
results.levels.english.A2.desc: Elementary — You can communicate in simple, routine tasks and describe your background.
results.levels.english.A2.goal: Practice expressing opinions and telling stories (B1)
results.levels.english.B1.desc: Intermediate — You can deal with most situations while traveling and describe experiences and events.
results.levels.english.B1.goal: Work on fluency, idioms, and discussing abstract topics (B2)
results.levels.english.B2.desc: Upper Intermediate — You can interact with a degree of fluency and spontaneity with native speakers.
results.levels.english.B2.goal: Refine nuance, formal register, and academic/professional English (C1)
results.levels.english.C1.desc: Advanced — You can express yourself fluently and spontaneously, using language flexibly for social, academic, and professional purposes.
results.levels.english.C1.goal: Maintain and deepen through native-level content and discussions
results.levels.japanese.starter.desc: You're just getting started! Focus on hiragana, katakana, and basic phrases.
results.levels.japanese.starter.goal: Master hiragana/katakana and learn basic greetings (N5)
results.levels.japanese.N5.desc: Beginner — You can read and understand typical expressions written in hiragana, katakana, and basic kanji.
results.levels.japanese.N5.goal: Learn basic grammar patterns and everyday vocabulary (N4)
results.levels.japanese.N4.desc: Elementary — You can understand basic Japanese used in everyday situations.
results.levels.japanese.N4.goal: Practice reading short passages and expressing opinions (N3)
results.levels.japanese.N3.desc: Intermediate — You can understand Japanese used in everyday situations to a certain degree.
results.levels.japanese.N3.goal: Read news articles and discuss topics with nuance (N2)
results.levels.japanese.N2.desc: Upper Intermediate — You can understand Japanese used in a variety of everyday and work situations.
results.levels.japanese.N2.goal: Master formal expressions and complex grammar (N1)
results.levels.japanese.N1.desc: Advanced — You can understand Japanese used in a variety of circumstances, including academic and professional contexts.
results.levels.japanese.N1.goal: Maintain through native-level reading and professional communication
login.title: Welcome Back
login.subtitle: Log in to your Geek Out With Me account
forgotPassword.title: Reset Password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email and we'll send you a reset link
forgotPassword.sent.title: Check Your Email
forgotPassword.sent.desc: We sent a password reset link to
forgotPassword.sent.descSuffix: Click the link in the email to set a new password.
resetPassword.title: Set New Password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter your new password below
resetPassword.tooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters.
resetPassword.done.title: Password Updated!
resetPassword.done.desc: Your password has been changed successfully.
signup.title: Create Account
signup.subtitle: Join Geek Out With Me and start your language journey
signup.checkEmail.title: Check Your Email
signup.checkEmail.desc: We sent a confirmation link to
signup.checkEmail.descSuffix: Click the link to activate your account.
pricing.title: Premium Community
pricing.desc: Get deeper support with voice lounges, personalized recommendations, and direct access to coaching.
history.empty.title: No assessments yet
history.empty.desc: Take your first level check to see your history here.
resources.title: Free Resources
resources.subtitle: Curated learning materials for Japanese and English learners
resources.japanese.title: Japanese Learning Resources
resources.english.title: English Learning Resources
resources.cta.title: Not sure which level to start?
resources.cta.desc: Take our free assessment to find resources matched to your level.
resources.japanese.tadoku.desc: Graded readers with illustrations and audio. Perfect for building reading confidence.
resources.japanese.yomujpN5.desc: Level-based readings about Japanese culture, food, and daily life with furigana.
resources.japanese.nhkEasy.desc: Real news written in simple Japanese with audio and furigana support.
resources.japanese.yomujpN3.desc: More complex topics covering society, culture, and current issues.
resources.japanese.yomujpN1.desc: Advanced readings for those approaching native-level comprehension.
resources.english.voaBeginner.desc: Video lessons and news read at a slower pace. Great for building listening skills.
resources.english.esol.desc: Simple reading materials on various topics with exercises.
resources.english.voaIntermediate.desc: News about health, science, technology, and culture at intermediate level.
resources.english.erCentral.desc: Short graded readings with progress tracking features.
resources.english.voaAdvanced.desc: Deep dives into English idioms and expressions.
community.title: Join Our Community
community.subtitle: Connect with fellow language geeks learning Japanese and English
community.exchange.title: Chat'n'Chill — Weekly Language Exchange
community.exchange.desc: Join our weekly Zoom meetup where Japanese and English learners come together to practice. All levels welcome — it's about connection, not perfection!
community.exchange.features.zoom: Weekly Zoom sessions (flexible schedule for all timezones)
community.exchange.howTo.title: How to Join
community.exchange.howTo.step2: Send a DM with this phrase:
community.exchange.howTo.step3: I'll invite you to the group!
community.youtube.title: Watch Geek Out With Me
community.youtube.desc: Hear real people share their passions in English. Learn language through authentic conversations about things that matter.
community.coaching.title: 1-on-1 Coaching
community.coaching.desc: Want personalized support? Get a tailored English coaching session built around YOUR passions — not a textbook.
community.rules.title: By joining, you agree to our community guidelines:
community.rules.text: Be respectful | No soliciting | No harassment | No unauthorized recording

voiceLounge.subtitle: Practice speaking with fellow learners in real-time
voiceLounge.premium.title: Premium Feature
voiceLounge.premium.desc: Voice Lounge is available for Premium Community members.

historyPage.subtitle: Track your language learning progress over time

rooms.newRoom.title: Create a New Room
rooms.empty.title: No rooms yet
rooms.empty.desc: Create the first room to start a conversation!
chat.noMessages: No messages yet. Start the conversation!
chat.imageTooLarge: Image is too large. Please select a smaller image.
chatRoom.errorWs: Connection error. Voice Lounge requires Durable Objects (Cloudflare Workers paid plan).
chatRoom.errorWsSub: Text chat is available below. Voice features require the full Durable Objects setup.
participants.title: Participants
workbook.subtitle: AI-powered personalized 30-day English workbooks
workbook.loginRequiredDesc: Please log in to use the workbook feature.
workbook.premiumDesc: 30-day English workbooks are a Premium-only feature.
workbook.samples.title: Sample Workbooks
workbook.samples.desc: Try these free 5-day sample workbooks to see what Premium offers.
workbook.noWorkbooksDesc: Chat with AI about your interests and create your personalized workbook!
workbook.create.title: Create Workbook
workbook.create.monthlyLimitDesc: You can create one workbook per month. Please try again next month.
workbook.noPublicWorkbooksDesc: When members share their workbooks publicly, they'll appear here.
workbook.visibility.label: Share publicly
workbook.visibility.publicDesc: Other premium members can view this workbook
workbook.visibility.privateDesc: Only you can see this workbook
workbook.generation.title: Creating your workbook...
workbook.generation.desc: AI is generating 30 days of content.
workbook.generation.descSub: You can navigate away — progress will resume when you return.
workbook.generation.startError: Failed to start workbook generation. Please reload the page.
workbook.generation.genError: An error occurred during generation. Please try again.
workbook.day.vocabHint: Check the words you didn't know
workbook.day.tryItHint: It's OK to copy from today's conversation! Japanese is fine for words you don't know.

langSelector.subtitle: Select the language you'd like to use on this site
